price: (33) And a sign for them is the dead earth. We have brought it to life and brought forth from it grain, and from it they eat.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ ٱلۡمَيۡتَةُ أَحۡيَيۡنَٰهَا وَأَخۡرَجۡنَا مِنۡهَا حَبّٗا فَمِنۡهُ يَأۡكُلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-arḍu al-maytatu aḥyaynāhā wa-akhrajnā min'hā ḥabban famin'hu yakulūna
